basket_tradeIn.name: basket_tradeIn
textContent: At checkout you’ll be asked how you’d like to return your eligible phone. You can either post it to us in a pre-paid envelope or drop it off in any of our stores.
Once our warehouse has received your phone, we’ll transfer your phone’s price in the way you’ve chosen.

If you chose a monthly saving, this will be applied straight away. If you chose bank transfer, the money will be with you in 5 to 10 working days. And if you chose trade-in credit, this will be added to your account automatically within 5 working days.
Use it to pay for anything billed to that account; early upgrade fees, Add-ons or broadband.
Plus, your trade-in is backed-up by our price guarantee, meaning we won’t be beaten by any other mobile network’s standard trade-in offer or we’ll give you the difference back.
basket_tradeIn.title: Your guaranteed trade-in

basket_esim_modal.heading: What is an eSIM?
basket_esim_modal.name: basket_esim_modal
basket_esim_modal.mainCopy:
What you need to know

eSIM stands for embedded sim. This means that an eSIM device has a SIM card in it that can't be removed. Hybrid devices or dual SIM devices can have one eSIM and one physical SIM.

How does an eSIM work?

Instead of putting a physical SIM in your device like usual, you will need to download one. After selecting an eSIM you will be sent an email with instructions on how to set it up. The process of downloading and setting up an eSIM will vary depending on the device you have, make sure to read the instructions carefully.

Why get an eSIM?

You may want to get an eSIM if you have multiple lines with us and want to use them on one device or you may want to switch your existing physical SIM to an eSIM if you want to get a local SIM while travelling.

Existing Vodafone customer?

What if I already have a physical SIM?

You will need to perform a SIM swap from your current SIM to an eSIM.

For more information, check out our SIM swap help pages

basket_pac_stac_content.heading: Joining us from another network?
basket_pac_stac_content.name: basket_pac_stac_content
basket_pac_stac_content.mainCopy:
Bring your current number to Vodafone with a PAC code, or get a new number with a STAC code.
Switching is quick, simple and can be done now or after your purchase.
